clues.clue: (James Lipton reads the clue.) The 19th century--more than 800 oil paintings and 700 drawings--yet  you sold but one in your 37 years.  Are you bitter?

clues.clue: (James Lipton reads the clue.) You finished "The Sick Child" in 1886.  7 years later, the world would recoil from "The Scream."  Tell us about your pain
